com.emc.ecs.connector.cloudfoundry

Class S3ServiceInfoCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.cloud.cloudfoundry.CloudFoundryServiceInfoCreator<S3ServiceInfo>
      • com.emc.ecs.connector.cloudfoundry.S3ServiceInfoCreator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.cloud.ServiceInfoCreator<S3ServiceInfo,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>>

    public class S3ServiceInfoCreator
extends org.springframework.cloud.cloudfoundry.CloudFoundryServiceInfoCreator<S3ServiceInfo>
    Provides an implementation of CloudFoundryServiceInfoCreator that detects S3 tagged services bound to Cloud Foundry deployed application. This class will be discovered and used automatically in a Spring Cloud Connector enabled application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      S3ServiceInfoCreator()
      Default Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      S3ServiceInfo createServiceInfo(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> serviceData)
      Parses Cloud Foundry serviceData Map and returns a normalized S3ServiceInfo instance to be used by Spring Cloud service connector creators.

      • Methods inherited from class org.springframework.cloud.cloudfoundry.CloudFoundryServiceInfoCreator

        accept, getCredentials, getDefaultUriScheme, getId, getIntFromCredentials, getStringFromCredentials, getUriFromCredentials, getUriSchemes, labelStartsWithTag, tagsMatch, uriKeyMatchesScheme, uriMatchesScheme

    • Constructor Detail

      • S3ServiceInfoCreator

        public S3ServiceInfoCreator()
        Default Constructor. The default behavior of the constructor is to match any Cloud Foundry service with a tag of "s3"

    • Method Detail

      • createServiceInfo

        public S3ServiceInfo createServiceInfo(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> serviceData)
        Parses Cloud Foundry serviceData Map and returns a normalized S3ServiceInfo instance to be used by Spring Cloud service connector creators. This Cloud Foundry serviceData Map is created based on the VCAP_SERVICES environment variable.
        Parameters:
        serviceData - a java.util.Map containing the following required fields: name, accessKey, secretKey; and the following optional fields: bucket & endpoint.
        Returns:
        S3ServiceInfo
